description: Kojima Jun`ichi (nicknamed "Jun") is the keyboardist in http://anidb.net/ch40597 [T.L.Signal]. He lives with http://anidb.net/ch5898 [Shingo], who is his opposite. He enjoys cooking and keeping their apartment. He is short and quiet. He seems to be the most down to earth and insightful member of the band, and mostly keeps to himself. Jun always wears yellow sunglasses. The groupies tend to frighten him a bit, but he still enjoys their attention.
name: Kojima Jun`ichi
